lines.text: Periodic force causes increase in amplitude of wave
The wind effect was in resonance with the bridgeâ€™s natural frequency

secText:
Enduring Understandings:
1. [OBJ:expsec_n273:Wave superposition] occurs when waves are combined.
2. In a [OBJ:expsec_n277:traveling wave], the disturbance moves from one location to another. In a [OBJ:expsec_n277:standing wave], the outline is constant.
3. [OBJ:expsec_n279:Reflected waves] can create a standing wave.
4. [OBJ:expsec_n279223:Resonance] causes an increase in wave amplitude.

STEM Skills:
1. Review [OBJ:expsec_m358:amplitude].
2. Review [OBJ:expsec_e763:Newton's third law].
3. Review [OBJ:expsec_m375:resonance].
